sql.statement: select *,substring(area FROM 1 FOR 2) as location,concat(conf_id,'.',user_id,'.',unix_timestamp(join_time)) as _id, date_format(convert_tz(join_time,'+00:00','+08:00'), '%Y-%m-%dT%T.000+08:00') as join_time_local from tn_userstat where join_time >= ?

row_extend.sql: select site_id from gs_tra_room where id=?
